channel.title: Project 2k9 V2 Release
channel.description:
ok before you start saying leech ect read the credits
CREDITS 45% Reapagescape for the base 45% Me For editing 10% Joe for helping me code
this is only V2 and havent added that much just skilling ect so please dont spam hate In V3 I Hope To Add The Following. [ul][li]full lumbridge npc list[/li] [li]full al kharid npc[/li] [li]full varrock npc[/li] [li]full falador npc[/li] [li]new ::skills area[/li] [li]new ::train area[/li] [li]everywhere that is wildi on rs wildi on here[/li] [li]members areas[/li] [li]new shopping area[/li] [li]all items correct bonus[/li] [li]all skillcape emotes[/li][/ul] Pictures :) Home [img]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/homearea.jpg[/img] Pk Area's same as V1 hope to change in V3 normal pk, made by me [img]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/newpk.jpg[/img] Multi, Made By Me [img]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/multineverseen.jpg[/img] Pkbox Again Made By Mee:P [img]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/newpkbox.jpg[/img] Barrows [img]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/barrows.jpg[/img] Shops (; [img]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/shops1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/shops2.jpg[/img] staff area definite change in V3 [img]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/staffarea.jpg[/img] Finally The Download :) mega upload ---[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=8M084JRW]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=8M084JRW[/url] uppit--[url=http://uppit.com/G02K1A]http://uppit.com/G02K1A[/url] rapidshare--[url=http://rapidshare.com/files/179941415/project_2k9_v2.rar.html]http://rapidshare.com/files/179941415/project_2k9_v2.rar.html[/url]

item.description:
@gs_pk_pure wrote:

[quote=“wolfs goal, post:3, topic:255051”]its an ok look, at least you didn’t try too look like your server was the best of them all…

and for that, and trying, and showing good work, rep++[/quote]

java is my bitch.:

Pretty good job mate

Thanktyyou for the positive comments i am working on V3 at the moment and hope to have it released by 15/1/09 but all depends lol

thankyou
